Sentencas: Fine grain zirconia-yttria materials are required for enhanced performance in solid oxide fuel cells and related devices and in applications requiring good thermo-mechanical properties.
Titulo: Analysis of the conductivity of commercial easy sintering grade 3 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 materials

Sentencas: Materials with about 3 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 composition are good electrolyte materials for solid oxide fuel cell, ceramic membrane oxygen separation and a number of related devices because of their superior mechanical properties and ease of fabrication into thin self-supporting structures in comparison with a material in the 8-10 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 composition range.
Titulo: Analysis of the conductivity of commercial easy sintering grade 3 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 materials

Sentencas: In this study, sintering behaviour, impedance studies, four-probe DC conductivity measurements and microstructure analysis has been performed on various easy sintering grade materials from two commercial powder suppliers.
Titulo: Analysis of the conductivity of commercial easy sintering grade 3 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 materials

Sentencas: These materials achieve near theoretical density at sintering temperatures as low as 1350-1400 degreesC. For direct comparison of the conductivity and impedance behaviour in easy sintering grade materials, several other 3 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 powders were also investigated.
Titulo: Analysis of the conductivity of commercial easy sintering grade 3 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 materials

Sentencas: The total ionic conductivity at 850 degreesC in easy sintering grade materials is comparable with normal-grade commercial materials of similar composition despite a slightly higher grain boundary impedance at lower temperatures (below similar to450 degreesC).
Titulo: Analysis of the conductivity of commercial easy sintering grade 3 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 materials

Sentencas: There were no obvious differences in the grain boundary thickness, calculated from the impedance data, of normal and easy sintering grade materials.
Titulo: Analysis of the conductivity of commercial easy sintering grade 3 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2 materials
